content.question: Traffic flow is defined as the rate at which cars pass through an intersection, measured in cars per minute. The traffic flow at a particular intersection is modeled by the function F defined by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>F</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>82</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGgbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caaI4aGaaGOmaiabgUcaRiaaisdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqada WdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadshaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaaaacaGL OaGaayzkaaaaaa@4429@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>30</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaiodacaaIWaaaaa@3CAA@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, where F(t) is measured in cars per minute and t is measured in minutes. (a) To the nearest whole number, how many cars pass through the intersection over the 30-minute period?

frqParts.text: Traffic flow is defined as the rate at which cars pass through an intersection, measured in cars per minute. The traffic flow at a particular intersection is modeled by the function F defined by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>F</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>82</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGgbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caaI4aGaaGOmaiabgUcaRiaaisdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqada WdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadshaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaaaacaGL OaGaayzkaaaaaa@4429@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>30</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaiodacaaIWaaaaa@3CAA@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, where F(t) is measured in cars per minute and t is measured in minutes. (a) To the nearest whole number, how many cars pass through the intersection over the 30-minute period?
(b) Is the traffic flow increasing or decreasing at t = 7? Give a reason for your answer.

(c) What is the average value of the traffic flow over the time interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>15</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIXaGaaGimaiabgsMiJkaadshacqGHKjYOcaaIXaGaaGynaaaa @3D68@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>? Indicate units of measure.
(d) What is the average rate of change of the traffic flow over the time interval <math> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>15</mn> </mrow> </math>? Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
